short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches info about the current page from Linker API. If the link is present in Linker Database, exposes its rating and base info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linkerhub is a convenient tool to get the Intel about web pages of various topics. Know in advance, whether the web page is worth your time by checking the user score of the page, left by our community. Share a found link with us or just store it on Linkerhub instead of keeping it among your open tabs.

This widget is a helper to simplify obtaining the information about the page the user is currently on. All the widget does is fetching current page info from Linkerhub database and provides to the user all available to Linkerhub information, including users' rating, link title and short description of the page.

If the page is not present in the Linkerhub's database, user will be prompted to add it, which can be conveniently made with the widget.
